title: High Level Road blocked due to protest demanding fuel
body_lines: High Level Road has reportedly been blocked for traffic at Delkanda Junction in Nugegoda due to a protest.
Ada Derana reporter said that a group of residents from the area have blocked the High Level Road at Delkanda Junction and are engaged in a protest demanding fuel.
This has resulted in severe traffic congestion in the area while motorists are advised to use alternate routes.
